Class
Description
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
An entity that is alive by having hit points.
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Application
 
Application
 
Application
The main class to start the game.
ArchetypeManager
A class that asks for the users to select the archetype and creates the player according to the archetype selected.
Archetypes
This class is an abstract class acting as template for which we can extend from and create archetypes (this will be particularly useful for future assignments).
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackAllAction
An action to attack all surrounding actors
AttackBehaviour
A behaviour that determines whether an Actor performs AttackAction to attack a single target or attack all actors in its surrounding using AttackAllAction
Bandit
This class is associated with Bandit, and initialises the attributes of Bandit.

Bug
 
BuyAction

Stores a list of actors that can buy and sell
BuySellCapable
Implemented by Player (maybe other Actor?) so that Buy and Sell action could be executed on it
Calculation
A class used for calculations that are repeated in the game
CapabilitySet
A collection of Capability objects.
Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.
Club
A hammer type, represented by ! (the exclamation mark), that deals 103 damage with an 80% hit rate.
Consumable
Interface that represents item that can be consume a finite of time by an Actor
ConsumeAction
An action that allows Actor to consume consumable items

DespawnAction
Despawns an actor from the map by removing it

A class that represents bare dirt.

An abstract drop action class

An abstract that represents enemies in the game

Class that represents a route from one Location to another.

Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
GameMap
Class representing one map within the system.
GiantCrab
Giant Crab enemy, hostile creature, represented by C (uppercase C), that has 407 hit points and slams other creatures, including the player, dealing 208 damage with 90% attack accuracy
GiantCrayfish
Giant Crayfish, hostile creature, represented by R (uppercase R), that has 4803 hit points and slams other creatures (single target attack), including the player, with their giant pincer, dealing 527 damage with 100% accuracy
GiantDog
Giant Dog, inhabitant of the Lands Between, represented by G (uppercase G), that has 693 hit points and slams other creatures (single target attack), including the player, with their head, dealing 314 damage with 90% accuracy.
Graveyard
A class that represents bare dirt.
GreatKnife
A dagger type, represented by / (the forward slash), that deals 75 damage with a 70% hit rate.
Grossmesser
A curved sword, represented by ? (question mark), carried around by the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman that deals 115 damage with 85% attack accuracy.
Ground
Class representing terrain type
GroundFactory
Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
GustOfWind
A class that represents bare dirt.
HeavySkeletalSwordsman
